explains: adj. 密闭的，密封的；无懈可击的

sentences.en: Store the peppercorns in an airtight container and grind the pepper as you need it.
sentences.cn: 将胡椒子储藏在密封容器里，当你需要的时候把它磨成粉。

sentences.en: The casing is nearly airtight, which helps protect the vulnerable egg and later larva.
sentences.cn: 外层几乎是密封的，可以保护脆弱的蜂卵，以及后来的幼虫。

sentences.en: If you go through your white flour in less than a year, you can safely keep it on the counter in an airtight jar or canister.
sentences.cn: 如果您可以在不到一年的时间里用完您的白面粉，那您就可以放心的把它放在柜台上的密闭瓶或罐中。
